subject: Hi guys
author: Chad
full_text:
Hi all,

I've been away for a few weeks now. We are busy putting together our
investigative team. We're sponsoring SPOOKS R US radio show on
www.para-x.com, and have been busy investigating and going through
evidence as of late. 

I hope all of you are doing well, and are having lots of fun with your
various projects. I'm uploading some new EVPs to my folder for you all
to listen to at your leisure. Hope you enjoy them.

If you're up for some good live radio programming, head over to
www.para-x.com for live shows on a nightly basis. I know, it sounds
like a plug, but I am absolutely addicted to the network and I know
you'll all enjoy it too. They have a chat room where you can interact
with the hosts and other listeners during the shows. They have great
paranormal guests and cover a wide range of topics from the paranormal
field. That's all I'll say about it, but it is awesome.

Well, I hope you guys enjoy our EVPs. Let us know what you think!

Chad 
GA.S.P.
